lines: I'm sorry. In order to play through this episode, you need a steady job. You can go to the WORK ICON and apply for one, then return.

You have been going through a difficult time with an influential businessperson who seems to really enjoy making people miserable with his sexist attitudes, his arbitrary decision-making and his arrogance.

You get called into his office to take the heat for a relatively minor error. The conversation begins, "Look, Darling. I've always believed that a woman's place is in the home. Unfortunately, those bleeding hearts upstairs have made it
impossible for me to deal 'man-to-man' around here. There are some problems here that I want resolved, AND NOW!"
#REFUSE TO LET HIM TALK TO YOU THAT WAY
*selectable_if (false) #GROVEL SO THAT HE WON'T FIRE YOU
#DON'T PAY TOO MUCH ATTENTION TO HIM
*selectable_if (false) #REFUSE TO LET HIM TALK TO YOU THAT WAY

#REFUSE TO LET HIM TALK TO YOU THAT WAY
*selectable_if (false) #GROVEL SO THAT HE WON'T FIRE YOU
#DON'T PAY TOO MUCH ATTENTION TO HIM
What would you like to say?
#"NOW JUST WAIT ONE MINUTE, YOU...(ADD YOUR OWN EXPLETIVE)."
#"I REFUSE TO BE SPOKEN TO IN THAT TONE OF VOICE."
#(WITH TEARS IN YOUR EYES) "DON'T YOU THINK I DESERVE A CHANCE TO EXPLAIN."

The man is shocked. He leans back in his chair and says, "This is the first real spunk you've ever shown me, Woman. I like a lass who knows how to speak her mind. That still doesn't let you off the hook for doing something stupid and
incompetent. You're out of a job"
#SCREAM AT HIM IN A LOUD VOICE

"I'll be damned if I'm going to let any sassy-mouthed filly speak to me in that tone!" Suddenly, the old man clutches his heart and begins to wheeze. He slumps over in his chair and passes out cold. It looks like he's had a heart attack!
You try to revive him, but he's a goner. The BIG boss walks in while you are trying to revive him...
and believes you were trying to do something heroic. You get a bonus!
He screams obscenities at you, threatening to call security if you don't haul your butt out of there pronto.
#GIVE HIM A ONE-FINGER SALUTE AND WALK OUT OF THE OFFICE
Tch! Tch! Temper, temper. Security is called and you are escorted bodily from the office.

By this time you have drawn a crowd. The entire office is laughing. You are doing precisely what others have only dreamed of. You leave to a hearty round of applause. The man is STILL ranting and raving like a lunatic, unaware that the
BIG boss is now within listening distance.
#MAKE UP A JUICY STORY ABOUT WHY THE BOSS HAS FLIPPED OUT
Well, you're still out of a job, but at least you are honest. Poor, mind you, but honest.

You tell the BIG boss, "You see, Sir, the hallucinations began about three months ago. He started yelling 'THE VOICES... THE VOICES... PLEASE STOP THE VOICES!' There was no controlling him after that. He has these fits about once a week,
usually at staff meetings." After hearing this, the BIG boss puts you in charge. You get a bonus!

"O.K.," the man whispers, "How about this?" His voice is barely audible, as he motions you over to the desk. He puts his arm around your shoulder and screams, "YOU'RE FIRED! OUT! OUT! I WANT YOU OUT, OUT, OUT!"
"As a matter of fact, I don't," he replies. He continues to chew you out, then finally finishes.
"And by the way, you can take the 'waterworks' outside, you're staining my rug."
The man says, "What are you standing around for? Get back to work." You have just been made a scapegoat. (You can always go back to the WORK ICON and look for a new job.)
"No, as a matter of fact, THAT'S NOT ALL... YOU'RE FIRED."

This form of resistance makes him even more furious. He begins to throw a fit, unaware that the BIG boss is right outside the office. When you emerge from the office, the BIG boss asks you what is going on.
It's a pity you feel that you have to lower yourself to this extent just to keep your job. It works. He doesn't fire you, but your Confidence and Happiness both drop greatly.
The calmness necessary for this set of responses just isn't in your personality. You try to remain calm, but the old man can see that you are shaking with nervousness.
You are, indeed, calm enough to behave this way in this situation. Your calmness serves as a positive influence on this person, who realizes he is treating you unfairly.

He interprets your aloofness as a sign of disrespect in the most extreme form. He fires you. He exaggerates his anger and behavior just to see if he can get a rise out of you, without realizing that the BIG boss is standing right outside
the office. When you emerge, the BIG boss wants to know what has been going on.
